config.siddhiApp: @App:name("HTTPAnalytics") define stream ProcessedRequestsStream(timestamp long, cellName string, serverName string, serviceName string, serviceMethod string, responseTime double, httpRespGroup string, userAgent string, requestIP string); @store(type="rdbms",datasource="HTTP_ANALYTICS_DB") define aggregation RequestAggregation from ProcessedRequestsStream select cellName, serverName, serviceName, serviceMethod, httpRespGroup, count() as numRequests, avg(responseTime) as avgRespTime group by cellName, serverName, serviceName, serviceMethod, httpRespGroup aggregate every sec...year;

queryData.query: from RequestAggregation {{filterCondition}} within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select {{groupBy}}, {{filterBy}} sum(numRequests) as numRequests group by {{groupBy}}
